attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2004-0217

Date: 2004-03-12

Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que l'honorable Russell G. Juriansz, juge de la Cour supérieure de justice, soit nommé juge de la Cour d'appel de l'Ontario et juge d'office de la Cour supérieure de justice.

 


                     The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advise that the Honourable Russell G. Juriansz, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice, be appointed a Judge of the Court of Appeal for Ontario and a Judge ex officio of the Superior Court of Justice.

Juriansz, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice, be appointed a Judge of the Court of Appeal for Ontario and a Judge ex officio of the Superior Court of Justice.
